DirectoryCleaner
Other
Cleans up a directory.
See also
Github - DirectoryCleaner Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.util.DirectoryCleaner
Syntax
Copy
<DirectoryCleaner />
Attributes
Required

This component has no required attributes

Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
directory	text	-
Directory to be cleaned up
retention	text	30d
Minimum amount of time (with suffix 'd', 'h', 'm' or 's') that must have passed before a file will be deleted. You may only use one suffix!
subdirectories	boolean	false
When true, files in subdirectories will be deleted, too
deleteEmptySubdirectories	boolean	false
When true, empty subdirectories will be deleted, too
notExistWarn	boolean	true
When set true, send warnings to logging and console about not existing directories
active	text	-
If defined and empty or false, then this element and all its children are ignored
Directory
